properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM; Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico AND USVI from 10 NM to 19.5N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 16 at 4:00AM AST until February 19 at 8:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Hazardous marine conditions are expected beginning Monday
morning...

.A northerly swell with enhanced winds will result in hazardous
seas beginning Monday, and lasting at least through Wednesday.
Most of our local waters will be impacted by this upcoming swell.

* WHAT...Seas 6 to 8 feet expected and east winds 15 to 20 kt with
gusts up to 30 kt.

* WHERE...Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico and USVI from 10 NM to
19.5N and Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 AM Monday to 8 AM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM MONDAY TO 8 AM AST WEDNESDAY
